bwwExcerpt: But “Merrily” is the most top-to-bottom perfect production of them all, from its muscular orchestrations to its vibrant ensemble to its sneakily devastating book by the late George Furth. Part of what makes the show so overwhelmingly emotional is that it transports us back to a more idealistic age: when possibilities seemed endless, friends were forever, and hopes weren’t yet dashed by life’s realities.

keyPhrases.quote: most top-to-bottom perfect production of them all

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic calls this the 'most top-to-bottom perfect production of them all' with praise for every element and describes it as 'overwhelmingly emotional' - clear rave territory. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses unqualified enthusiasm and praise for the production, indicating it is a must-see experience.
